extendedInfo.description: In case of incompatibility please have a look on our website: http://www.sidiary.org/customerservice-faqv6-2088.asp?IDSprache=2To work with a diabetes logbook on your Android device is very simple with SiDiary. You can track all relevant data for your therapy like blood glucose, carbohydrates, medication like insulin and so on quick in a simple data mask to make it visible on your Android device. You can analyze it with the statistic function or with our trend analysis.If you already use the PC version of SiDiary to read out your meters, insulin pump, etc. - you can add this data also to your Android device by simply synchronizing it with SiDiary Online.The features of this app so far:â¢	easiest entry of all data with the numeric keypadâ¢	all data can be tracked with a scrollable input maskâ¢	clearly arranged display of your daily data in SiDiary's typical styleâ¢	lots of statistic-graphics (pie chart, line graph, modal day and detailed statistic)â¢	trend analysis (how was the progress of your therapy in the last days/weeks/months?)â¢	fast synchronization of your data with 'SDiary Online', from where you are able to print your data stand-alone from your operating system or synchronize the data with your desktop computer version of SiDiaryâ¢	option for automatically synchronization (after shut down the app and/or at midnight)â¢	user defined data types, which you have defined in your pc-version can also be used on the Android after a synchronization with 'SiDiary Online'â¢	blood glucose values can be entered in mg/dl or mmol/lâ¢	body weight can be entered in kg or lbsâ¢	carbohydrates can be entered in gram or any other exchange unit (such as BE/KE, etc.)â¢	date format dd.mm or mm-ddâ¢	time format 24h or 12h am/pmâ¢	data rows that you don't want to use can be hiddenYou can use 'SiDiary Android' stand-alone, but this version can also enhance the pc-version - e.g. you can download readings from your blood glucose meter, insulin pump, blood pressure meter or pedometer with your pc-version and enter additional data on the way in your Android version. After synchronizing your desktop computer and your Android both with 'SiDiary Online' all of your data will be merged into one logbook. Since synchronization with 'SiDiary Online' will be started manually - you always have the full control of possible costs for your online connection.You can use the app in the adware mode (with commercial ads) as long as you wish. Please note that in this mode only the last 7 calendar days can be synchronized with SiDiary Online.The app claims for the following rights (legend in brackets):â¢	read phone state and identity (to build the apps serial number)â¢	your roughly estimated (network-based) location (for commercial ads in your language)â¢	full internet access (download ads and transfer data on demand to SiDiary Online)â¢	storage (to store data locally on your device)â¢	paid services (send short messages: optional, must be turned on first: when the blood glucose is exceeding or falling below the limit values a SMS can be send to a predetermined number (eg, to the parents or the diabetes team)â¢       system tools (to establish Bluetooth connection to Fora Diamond Mini BT glucose meter by request)

reviews.title: Data Lost...
reviews.comment: After all the data capture for over a week, I just could not find the records. GONE! It is not showing trend
reviews.author: BUSHRAL YUSOB

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: Does everything well. Only two complaints 1. I take three types of insulin but I can only figureout how to add two .  2. I wish the web reports or desktop app reports were more customizable..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Have used for quick reports for a while,seems to auto rotate lately  Update :  Wish there was a decimal point in landscape mode, only supports one device,shucks.Update, does now
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It was a Great app
reviews.comment: ... For diabetes sufferers. However after my Samsung Galaxy Nexus upgraded to 4.3 I can no longer enter any data :(     NB: SiDiary itself updated today (3 Aug) but still can\'t enter data.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s working in Landscape Format
reviews.comment: Thankfully, the team from Sinovo are dedicated to rectifying problems that crop up. Since the update of my Nexus to Jelly Bean 4.3, I have not been able to use my Nexus. So after receiving an email to use it in Landscape, and it works. I could sync and now access my records when I need to. I\'m sure it will be back to normal soon, it\'s the best by far.
reviews.author: Kristine Wyld

reviews.title: Excellent monitoring tool
reviews.comment: Worked great until my device was updated to android 4.3, can\'t enter any values any more. Hope it\'s updated soon.
reviews.author: Robert Brown

reviews.comment: Nach ca 2 Monaten kein weiterer Eintrag mehr mgl. + Button ohne Funktion. (Auch nach Versionsupdate) Motorola Defy, Android 2.1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sweet
reviews.comment: One of the best trackers I\'ve seen short of pen and paper
reviews.author: Josh San Miguel

reviews.title: Used it for years
reviews.comment: Latest android update makes a great program useable on my Galaxy S3 on CM  10.1.1.
reviews.author: Dan Danz

reviews.comment: Trying to find the one app to hold all of the readings from different sources.\tThis seems to be the best app so far. Have not yet paid for full app use as of now.
reviews.author: Paul Loring

reviews.title: Utterly the best diabetes app available
reviews.comment: The decisive features are the a1c and statistics. This is top drawer work.   Diabetes management is more precise and of higher utility .
reviews.author: DeWitt Fitts

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Best diabetes app. N a while
reviews.author: BRANDON HOLLAND

reviews.comment: Just downloaded so far it looks to be handy.
reviews.author: Thomas Stewart

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Any chance a pregnancy option could be added for those of us with gestational diabetes? We have slightly different parameters.
reviews.author: Emma Irwin

reviews.title: Sohail
reviews.comment: Very nice app
reviews.author: Sohail Nasir

reviews.comment: Fastibg,pp and random values not providd
reviews.author: shanmugavel arumugam

reviews.title: Best diabetes apps
reviews.comment: Everything is here, record your every glucose test and estimated your H1c. Monitor your blood glucose every second you like. Keep it up! If the apps can input insulin in take amount is better, so we can more precisely monitoring
reviews.author: Mcgaymond Foong

reviews.comment: I\'ve tried several apps for monitoring glucose levels some paid ones also I find this app easy to use and\tI kept this app over the others because of its ease of use and the reports it can generate.
reviews.author: Larry Wleczyk

reviews.title: Makes life easier
reviews.comment: This helps so much and helps keep an eye on your A1C levels,  Its a lifesaver!
reviews.author: ashlynn hubka

reviews.title: Si
reviews.comment: Excellent program all input on one screen so it is quick .charts and graphics  easy to use.flexible so can customize
reviews.author: Damon Harrison
